entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
